languages.text: "Отойди от священного реактора, и, может быть, я позволю тебе сдаться в плен".
"Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."
languages.original_text: "Отойди от священного реактора, и, может быть, я позволю тебе сдаться в плен".

traits.locale_text: "Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."
"Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."
"Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."
"Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."
"Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."
"Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."

languages.text: "Tretet von dem heiligen Reaktor weg, vielleicht gestatte ich Euch dann, Euch zu ergeben."
languages.original_text: "Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."

traits.locale_text: "Tretet von dem heiligen Reaktor weg, vielleicht gestatte ich Euch dann, Euch zu ergeben."

languages.text: « Écartez-vous du réacteur sacré et je vous autoriserai peut-être à vous rendre. »
languages.original_text: "Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."

traits.locale_text: « Écartez-vous du réacteur sacré et je vous autoriserai peut-être à vous rendre. »

languages.text: “离那个神圣反应堆远点，说不定我会接受你的投降。”
languages.original_text: "Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."

traits.locale_text: “离那个神圣反应堆远点，说不定我会接受你的投降。”

languages.text: 「神聖なリアクターから離れるのなら、降伏を許可してもいい」
languages.original_text: "Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."

traits.locale_text: 「神聖なリアクターから離れるなら、降伏を許可してもいい」

languages.text: «Aléjate del reactor sagrado y quizá te permita rendirte».
languages.original_text: "Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."

traits.locale_text: «Aléjate del reactor sagrado y quizá te permita rendirte».

languages.text: "Kutsal reaktörden uzaklaşırsan teslim olmana izin verebilirim."
languages.original_text: "Step away from the sacred reactor and I might allow you to surrender."

traits.locale_text: "Kutsal reaktörden uzaklaşırsan sana teslim olma ayrıcalığı tanıyabilirim."
